item.description:
Do all things Paranormal spark your interest? Then join us and Susan Allen of Souhegan Paranormal Investogators (SPI) and her team as they share with the public their findings in our very own space here at The HSCC! Evidence ranging from EVP's, personal experiences, pictures and even video will be presented!

 

I saw the reveal already and all I can say is that I know I have loved ones around me all the time but this just made it even more real for me! Come hear what Sue and her team has to say!

Come early, we are opening part of the rooms so you can walk around to see the spaces where the investigation was done! Have some snacks and a drink to relax before the reveal starts at 6:30.

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Paranoram Investigators Reveal Findings of the HSCC
